headline: How The Story Around U.S. Bancorp (USB) Is Shifting After Earnings And New Street Targets
summary: Analysts have nudged their consensus price target on U.S. Bancorp stock from about US$57.50 to around US$60.84, reflecting refreshed models after recent earnings updates. Behind that shift sit only modest tweaks, including a slightly lower discount rate of roughly 7.68% and a small lift in the revenue growth assumption to about 8.62%, as research teams weigh stronger earnings inputs against more cautious ratings.
